title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - NFL Draft Betting w/ Matthew Freedman
itunes:title: The Favorites Sports Betting Podcast - NFL Draft Betting w/ Matthew Freedman
description:
The NFL Draft is approaching! And to kickoff our first of three betting episodes covering the most exciting days of the NFL offseason, Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter welcome FantasyPros head of content and mock draft maven Matthew Freedman to the show. Together the trio discuss the draft prop bets they're currently making, speculate on where the top quarterbacks will land, and so much more.

Plus, for those in Las Vegas for the NFL Draft next week, follow this link to RSVP for Action Network's free Happy Hour in downtown Vegas on April 27th!

https://www.actionnetwork.com/press/action-nfl-draft-pre-party

Hope to see you there! #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
